entry.title: Garbidž
entry.content: <!-- --- layout: inner position: left title: 'Garbidž' date: 2021-06-26 18:32:00 +02:00 categories: development tags: [Java, Spring Boot, Docker, Flutter] featured_image: '/img/posts/03_garbidz-1280x2680.png' project_link: 'https://github.com/adamzv/garbidz' button_icon: 'github' button_text: 'Visit Project' lead_text: 'Team project focused on simulating a startup which develops a mobile app for tracking and locating garbage cans around the city. Users can locate nearest containers (we're tracking each type of container available) or they can set up notification for the nearest waste collection. Mobile app was created using Flutter, for backend we used Spring Boot, MySQL db and Docker for deployment. Team consisted of 5 developers, I was the teamleader and a backend developer.' --- -->
